title: Rigmon App
author: Rigmon App
content: Utilize mining rigs at 100% with our monitoring appCheck mining status 24/7 and maximize profitsWebsite: https://rigmon.netHow to guide: https://rigmon.gitbook.io/en/ <= must read!AppsiOS: https://apps.apple.com/hn/app/rigmon-gpu-miner-monitoring/id1551923688 ★★★★★ 4.7Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.rigmon ★★★★☆ 4.3Support OSWindowsHiveOSSImpleMining OSRaveOSSupport MinerPhoenix MinerGMinerT-Rex minerNBMinerlol MinerTeam Red MinerTeam Black MinerFeaturesEvery information you can get from Miner Program (hash rate, core temp, gpu temp, shares, uptime, fan speed, and so on)App Push notificationTotal hash graphPool monitoring (Ethermine, Miningpoolhub, Nanopool, 2miner)Web monitoring (BETA stage)Pricingup to 4 miner - Trial (Limited functionality)up to 10 miner $9.99/moup to 20 miner $18.99/moup to 200 miner $ 29.99/mo

comments.author: Rigmon App
comments.body: Rigmon was released 2 years ago. About 2 thousand miners are using the Rigmon App.If you have any problems or requests, please leave a comment.
